sounds.name: 1920s Speakeasy

sounds.description: The timeless sound of a 747 cabin in flight

sounds.description: The blackness of space, the silence of the open sea, the depths of a cave

sounds.name: Adventure Begins
sounds.description: Every story has a beginning

sounds.name: Adventure Supply
sounds.description: Everything you need for your next adventure is sold here

sounds.name: Aftermath
sounds.description: Humanity always finds a way

sounds.description: This throbbing mass of bio-electrical energy powers everything

sounds.description: Ten thousand years have gone by without a response

sounds.description: A mystical library in which everything is in motion

sounds.description: A beautifully chaotic, and frenzied environment for work, or play

sounds.description: In a tiny attic room, rain pattering against the window, fire in the grate, pen in hand

sounds.description: Desolate, dessicated and dire

sounds.description: A ground assault on a heavily fortified position

sounds.description: "War does not determine who is right - only who is left

sounds.description: All great cities have a seedy side

sounds.description: A controlled, self-sufficient eco-system

sounds.description: A massive library inside a fortress

sounds.description: It's the summer of an indiscriminate year

sounds.name: Carriage Journey
sounds.description: A long, rainy journey in a horse drawn carriage

sounds.description: A massive, bustling kitchen was often the center of activity in a medieval castle

sounds.name: Catacombs
sounds.description: Dimly lit and twisting

sounds.name: Cathedral
sounds.description: Cavernous, cold and quiet

sounds.name: City Under Siege
sounds.description: Pinned down

sounds.description: Shelves brim with books and scrolls of ancient knowledge

sounds.description: Equal parts blood sport, theater and ritual murder

sounds.description: Harlem, 1920s

sounds.description: A place to potter about, fixing things that want fixing

sounds.description: Your strangely alluring host beckons you to join him in his private study

sounds.name: Covert Ops
sounds.description: A dark and gritty world of espionage

sounds.description: The fee for ferrying the dead is a single coin, placed in the mouth

sounds.description: A sharp-eyed scamp wanders a medieval city's back alleys

sounds.name: Cyberpunk City
sounds.description: The true melting pot

sounds.description: A dark homage to the 90s

sounds.description: A slow burn action / suspense soundtrack for dark modern settings

sounds.description: The sound of the cosmos, or an alternate dimension

sounds.name: Dark and Stormy
sounds.description: "It was a dark and stormy night, the rain fell in torrents -- except at occasional intervals when it was checked by a violent gust of wind

sounds.description: The deal was simple: 4 years working on a deep space mining operation and you could return to earth a free man

sounds.description: Remnants of a secret religious sect lie in ruin

sounds.name: Demon Army
sounds.description: Beyond the gates of hell, the horde prepares for battle

sounds.description: A seedier tavern on the other side of town

sounds.description: The listing hulk of a derelict space craft makes a tempting salvage target

sounds.name: Descent
sounds.description: Grab that 50 feet of rope

sounds.name: Desert Devotional
sounds.description: This ancient ritual often goes on for weeks

sounds.description: As much a fortress as it is a place of devotion

sounds.description: The person you're supposed to meet is always somewhere in the docks district

sounds.name: Dome City Center
sounds.description: Amid the bustle of commerce, life under the dome runs smoothly

sounds.description: You probably shouldn't have picked up that ancient idol

sounds.description: Sometimes the only sure thing is the end

sounds.name: Egg Chamber

sounds.description: Shrouded from human sight, elves of the forest have congregated here for centuries

sounds.description: A secret elf ritual that few mortals have ever witnessed

sounds.description: Big, brash, pulpy

sounds.name: Everdeep
sounds.description: A vast underwater city, hidden for millennia

sounds.description: "Here am I, floating round my tin can"

sounds.name: Farmyard
sounds.description: A small plot of land, well tended

sounds.description: Soldiers gather in the great hall for a feast before battle

sounds.description: A busy little village on the southern shore of somewhere

sounds.description: "The play's the thing

sounds.name: Royal Court
sounds.description: In this highly structured setting, those who attend the monarch gather to plot and collude

sounds.name: Royal Salon
sounds.description: The Royal Salon, France, early 18th Century: a minefield of verbal sparring, whispered plots and social combat

sounds.name: Russian Winter
sounds.description: "People don't notice whether it's winter or summer when they're happy" - Anton Chekhov

sounds.name: Salt Marsh
sounds.description: Between ocean and grasslands, lies this ambiguous, liminal space

sounds.name: Samurai HQ
sounds.description: Wealthy Japanese feudal lords used Samurai as their private armies

sounds.name: Sand Raiders
sounds.description: On a desert planet, far far away

sounds.name: Sanitarium
sounds.description: A private facility on a windy bluff

sounds.name: Sea of Moving Ice
sounds.description: These northern waters are treacherous and cold

sounds.name: Secret Facility
sounds.description: You're awake, but remember nothing

sounds.name: Secret Garden
sounds.description: A quiet, magical clearing in the forest

sounds.name: Sewers
sounds.description: Dank and teeming with the foul and pestilent denizens of darkness

sounds.name: Shadowfell
sounds.description: An unpredictable realm of depression, stasis and despair

sounds.name: Shaman's Hollow
sounds.description: A secluded spot in the forest where the magic is concentrated

sounds.name: Shanghai 1930s
sounds.description: Known as 'The Paris of the East, the New York of the West'

sounds.name: Shelter from the Storm
sounds.description: Admittedly, it may not be the perfect spot

sounds.name: Ship of the Line
sounds.description: The fastest ship in the fleet, and the best appointed

sounds.name: Shopping Mall
sounds.description: A temple to the gods of modern consumerism

sounds.name: Shrine of Talos
sounds.description: God of storms

sounds.name: Shuttle Crash
sounds.description: Surviving was the easy part

sounds.name: Skirmish
sounds.description: Oh, it's on

sounds.name: Skull Island
sounds.description: As your ship approaches, you feel like you're being watched

sounds.name: Skullwharf
sounds.description: A dangerous, underground port accessible only by sea caves and secret passages

sounds.name: Skyship
sounds.description: These magestic, flying vessels require powerful magic to create and operate

sounds.name: Sleeping Dragon
sounds.description: Coiled and half buried on a towering mound of treasure, an ancient red dragon slumbers

sounds.name: Sleeping Ogre
sounds.description: The way is clear, there's just one not-so-small problem

sounds.name: Solemn Vow
sounds.description: When death is near, and retreat is not an option

sounds.name: Space Battle
sounds.description: Epic finale to a galactic conflict

sounds.name: Spider's Den
sounds.description: A massive arachnid lurks amongst the bones of its victims

sounds.name: Spire: Amaranth
sounds.description: The crystalline, frozen home of the haughty, masked, high elves that rule Spire

sounds.name: Spire: Derelictus
sounds.description: Destitute

sounds.name: Spire: New Heaven
sounds.description: Impossibly high burial grounds where hyenas prowl the streets, and preachers and zealots singing the praises of their gods

sounds.name: Spire: The Hatchery
sounds.description: Arachnid midwives tend to clutches of unborn with ministrations of blood

sounds.name: Spire: The Heart
sounds.description: A rotting hole in reality buried at the centre of the mile-high, ancient building that is Spire

sounds.name: Spire: The Ministry
sounds.description: A secret, shadowy society devoted to the forbidden worship of a goddess

sounds.name: Spire: The Vermissian
sounds.description: A massive train network where trains have never really run

sounds.name: Spirit of the Plains
sounds.description: The great stag of the plains is seldom seen, and speaks to few mortals

sounds.name: Stables
sounds.description: In medieval times, horses were vital for trade, travel, and war

sounds.name: Stagecoach Heist
sounds.description: A thrilling ride through a beautiful landscape

sounds.name: Stakeout
sounds.description: Who watches the watchmen?

sounds.name: Star Freighter
sounds.description: A massive interstellar vessel used for long haul cargo runs

sounds.name: Starbase Omega
sounds.description: The promenade of this massive orbital station hums with activity

sounds.name: Starship Adrift
sounds.description: Set engines to low, hide in a nearby nebula

sounds.name: Starship Bridge
sounds.description: The hum of engines, the vibrations of deck plates - as familiar to you as a childhood lullaby

sounds.name: Starship Medical
sounds.description: The combined anatomical knowledge of the known galaxy

sounds.name: Steampunk Airship
sounds.description: Designed by the greatest watchmaker in Olde-Town, the airship "Gulliver" will ferry you above the fray in style!

sounds.name: Steampunk Station
sounds.description: A huge central clock, and all manner of contraptions, keep the trains running on time

sounds.name: Steel Foundry
sounds.description: Shadows dance on soot-blackened walls

sounds.name: Storm at Sea
sounds.description: A terrifying squall from the east

sounds.name: Strangers on a Train
sounds.description: With its lush interiors, fine dining and finer passengers, the Orient Express was the most well-appointed overland transportation available

sounds.name: Submerged
sounds.description: Floating beneath the surface, one world disappears, another awakens

sounds.name: Summoning
sounds.description: A coven prepares to summon an ancient spirit

sounds.name: Sun Dappled Trail
sounds.description: You and your party on horseback, travelling through a beautiful forest

sounds.name: Sunken Temple
sounds.description: Lost for millenia beneath the waves, an ancient edifice holds countless mysteries

sounds.name: Sunken Treasure
sounds.description: In the depths, lie the bounty

sounds.name: Super Hero
sounds.description: Like a Michael Bay movie in your head

sounds.name: Survivors' Bivouac
sounds.description: A rag tag group stops to make camp, and reflect on what went wrong

sounds.name: Swamp Planet
sounds.description: An entire planet, shrouded in dense mist, and teeming with life

sounds.name: Swamp Thing
sounds.description: Deep within a fetid swamp, an ancient creature lurks

sounds.name: Swamplandia
sounds.description: Hot, humid and swarming with insects of every kind

sounds.name: Tarrasque Interior
sounds.description: A special holiday free gift! Part of a huge collaboration project

sounds.name: Tavern Celebration
sounds.description: The mead must flow

sounds.name: Tavern Music
sounds.description: It's midsummer night down at the "Adventurer's Arms" and the bards are all here

sounds.name: Temple Garden
sounds.description: Order and beauty exist in perfect balance here

sounds.name: Temple of Helm
sounds.description: May Helm protect you and absolve you of your curses and afflictions

sounds.name: Temple of the Eye
sounds.description: Hooded figures gather around a gleaming eye, smoke wriggles like serpents to the ceiling

sounds.name: Terraforming
sounds.description: It takes decades to create an atmosphere on a lifeless planet

sounds.name: Terror
sounds.description: There are doors you should not open

sounds.name: Terror in the Woods
sounds.description: It's dark, you can hear them closing in

sounds.name: Testing Chamber
sounds.description: An empty factory floor, towering spires of self-activated machines

sounds.name: The Age of Sail
sounds.description: Fear not the mountainous waves and perilous winds! For who among us, will journey upon the sea and not gaze, ultimately, upon himself?

sounds.name: The Age of Steam
sounds.description: A long hiss from a massive locomotive blankets the platform in thick white mist while porters scurry about with baggage carts

sounds.name: The Ansible
sounds.description: An ancient device for instant communication over unimaginable distances

sounds.name: The Attic
sounds.description: An old house has many secrets

sounds.name: The Bog Standard
sounds.description: A run-of-the-mill medieval tavern

sounds.name: The City Above
sounds.description: High above the city, there is peace, and possibility

sounds.name: The Desert Awaits
sounds.description: The air before you distorts in the heat

sounds.name: The Drowned Tower
sounds.description: An ancient tower lies forgotten in the depths, guarded by leviathans

sounds.name: The Feywild
sounds.description: An echo of the Prime Material Plane, where arcane energy flows like water

sounds.name: The Frozen Trail
sounds.description: A serene and snowy backdrop, against which anything can happen

sounds.name: The Gaping Maw
sounds.description: Looming before you is a massive black gate, carved into the side of a mountain

sounds.name: The Great Lift
sounds.description: There's only one way up - or down

sounds.name: The Hearth Inn
sounds.description: A bookish sort of place

sounds.name: The Inner Core
sounds.description: You're deep into it this time

sounds.name: The Long Rain
sounds.description: "It was a hard rain, a perpetual rain, a sweating and steaming rain; it was a mizzle, a downpour, a fountain

sounds.name: The Madding Crowd
sounds.description: Crowded cities can often be comforting

sounds.name: The Misty Marsh
sounds.description: A crepuscular paddle among the rushes and reeds

sounds.name: The Orrery
sounds.description: A massive mechanical solar system rotates above the monks

sounds.name: The Sisterhood
sounds.description: The Sisterhood's plans encompass millennia

sounds.name: The Slaughtered Ox
sounds.description: A horn of mead, a bowl of stew and a hook to hang your 50 feet of rope,  The Slaughtered Ox has been catering to the adventuring class for eons

sounds.name: The Steppes
sounds.description: A Mongolian flavored battle track

sounds.name: The Stranger
sounds.description: Mysterious drifter, menacing outsider, or loner hero

sounds.name: The Underdark
sounds.description: A vast subeterranean network of interconnected caverns

sounds.name: The Wild Hunt
sounds.description: Charging through the forest on horseback

sounds.name: There be Dragons!
sounds.description: Wiping the last of the Kobold blood from your axe, you glare in the direction of the Cleric

sounds.name: Thieves' Guild
sounds.description: Live in shadow

sounds.name: Throne Room
sounds.description: A grand chamber where a monarch granted audience, held council and received homage

sounds.name: Through the Woods
sounds.description: A horse-drawn carriage hurtles down a dark wooded lane

sounds.name: Tinkerer's Workshop
sounds.description: This gnomish proprieter is a wizard with metal

sounds.name: Tinkertown
sounds.description: Machines fixing machines, fixing machines

sounds.name: Tomb Guardians
sounds.description: Two giant statues guard the secrets of the vault

sounds.name: Trail of Ashes
sounds.description: From battle to battle, war marches on

sounds.name: Train Job
sounds.description: A 1960s-era heist film, starring you and your dashing friends

sounds.name: Training Grounds
sounds.description: The bustling courtyard of a castle often included soldiers drilling and sparring

sounds.name: Treacherous Path
sounds.description: "I know a shortcut!" - The bard, probably

sounds.name: Trireme
sounds.description: It's a beautiful day for a boat ride around the Greek Islands

sounds.name: Troll Grotto
sounds.description: Mog is an ornery troll who prefers the quiet life above the Arctic Circle

sounds.name: True West
sounds.description: Sometimes having a price on your head isn't enough to keep you out of town

sounds.name: Uncommon Valor
sounds.description: Bullets buzz overhead like wasps defending a hive

sounds.name: Underground Lake
sounds.description: Deep beneath the mountain, a massive lake shimmers before you

sounds.name: Unto the Breach
sounds.description: "When the blast of war blows in our ears, Then imitate the action of the tiger" - W

sounds.name: Vampire's Castle
sounds.description: A sprawling gothic mansion at midnight

sounds.name: Vampyr
sounds.description: "I want you to believe

sounds.name: Vault of Terror
sounds.description: A collaboration with world-class adventure designer DMDave!

sounds.name: Victorian London
sounds.description: London, 1851

sounds.name: Victorian Slums
sounds.description: Overcrowded, disease-ridden and poxy

sounds.name: Viking Tavern
sounds.description: What's better than an ale, and a warm fire after a day of pillaging?

sounds.name: Viking Village
sounds.description: Life in a northern town

sounds.name: Vikings
sounds.description: "Valhalla, I am coming

sounds.name: Village of the Damned
sounds.description: Something is terribly, terribly wrong here

sounds.name: Volcano
sounds.description: The mouth of hell itself, a smoldering vista of rock and lava

sounds.name: Voyage Begins
sounds.description: Dock workers and sailors prepare a ship for departure

sounds.name: Wagon Ride
sounds.description: A solemn ride to an uncertain destination

sounds.name: Waiting Time
sounds.description: Tick Tock, sometimes adventures need a little downtime music

sounds.name: War Zone
sounds.description: Incessant shelling of the city below as attack helicopters drone above

sounds.name: Warehouse 13
sounds.description: An old cement factory on the outskirts of town

sounds.name: Warlock's Whisper
sounds.description: Dark magic

sounds.name: Waterkeep
sounds.description: The fabled jeweled city of the north, a hub for trade, commerce and culture

sounds.name: Waterkeep: Night
sounds.description: Nighttime in the jewel of the north

sounds.name: Weirder Things
sounds.description: An homage to an era, and a show

sounds.name: Weirder Things: 2
sounds.description: The sequel, to the homage that was the first Weirder Things track

sounds.name: Western Watchtower
sounds.description: A once mighty bulwark lies fallow in a time of peace

sounds.name: Whirlpool
sounds.description: A deadly ocean vortex threatens to devour your ship and crew

sounds.name: Whispering Caverns
sounds.description: An underground prison for tortured souls

sounds.name: Whiteout
sounds.description: Up is down, down is up, and you're freezing

sounds.name: Wild West Saloon
sounds.description: The rootenest, tootenest, honky tonk this side of Deadwood

sounds.name: Windswept Plains
sounds.description: A small band of horsemen bivouac under a never ending sky

sounds.name: Winter Festival
sounds.description: Holiday celebrations in a small snowy town

sounds.name: Winter Woods
sounds.description: Cold wind, dry branches, hardy birds

sounds.name: Witch Mountain
sounds.description: A lively and chaotic night of magic and danger

sounds.name: Wizard's Tower
sounds.description: Amidst bottles and books and beasts in their cage, toils a mighty magician, a wizard most sage

sounds.name: Wolf Pens
sounds.description: Deep underground, 3 massive, chained wolves are kept hungry

sounds.name: Woodland Campsite
sounds.description: Every adventurer needs downtime

sounds.name: Wuxia Tea House
sounds.description: A peaceful sanctuary to contemplate the essence of the sword

sounds.name: Wuxia Village
sounds.description: A desolate mountain town awaits a hero

sounds.name: Xingu Nights
sounds.description: Dense, rich and verdant, the forest floor oozes with life and decay

sounds.name: Yuletide
sounds.description: A cozy fireside gathering of family and friends for the holidays

sounds.name: Yōkai Forest
sounds.description: The veil between our world, and the spirit world, is especially thin here

sounds.name: Zombies!
sounds.description: A shambling mass of former humans lurches through the snow, drawn to the scent of your flesh
